reviews.course_name: South Africa in the 19th and 20th Centuries
reviews.review_content: Amanda was amazing and brilliant! She was very friendly and helpful and understood South African history very well. Her guest lectures were very impressive as well. If the class is offered again with her as TA, take her over Kevin if at all possible. However, section is optional and since Marcia Wright likely retired I have no idea what the future of this class is.

reviews.course_name: South Africa in the 19th and 20th Centuries
reviews.review_content: Amanda is a terrific TA.  I found her discussion sections so helpful that I went to all of them even though they were optional.  Not only is she very approachable, but she really knows what she's talking about and is great at distilling dense reading assignments.  She's also very helpful with brainstorming paper topics.  Consider yourself lucky if you get Amanda as your TA.
